title: Annotation Schema
TODOS: Usually an annotation is a simple comment. In the future an annotation can be an image, for instance a probability mask.

status.description: Status of the annotation: saved or submitted

roiId.description: Id of the ROI annotated by this annotation

materializedTaskId.description: Id of the materialized task used to created the ROI. If not set then the materialized task has not been submitted.

properties.description: Properties of the annotation. The list of properties depends in the type of annotation.

ontologyId.description: Id of the ontology where the value of the annotation is retrieved.

ontologyValue.description: Value in the ontology selected for the annotation.

PreferredName.description: Value preferred bame in the ontology selected for the annotation.
